entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
